name: A Lonely Island Lost in the Middle of a Foggy Sea

ingredients.item: Demerara syrup (1 part demerara sugar, 1 part water)
La Colombe Pure Black Cold Press Coffee

preparation:
Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.
Shake vigorously for 10 seconds and strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with pineapple leaves and coffee beans.
